trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDividerDoubleClick"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDividerDoubleClick"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowDividerDoubleClickEventArgs"></xref> class.
This constructor initializes the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property using the `rowIndex` value.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>属性使用`rowIndex`值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The values of properties inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs> are initialized to the values specified in `e`.
trans-unit.target: 属性的值继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs>初始化中指定的值为`e`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row above the row divider that was double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 上面的行分隔线的被单击的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs"></xref> containing the inherited event data.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs"></xref>包含继承的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row above the row divider that was double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 上面的行分隔线的被单击的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index is the zero-based index of the row in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引是中的行的从零开始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row above the divider.
trans-unit.target: 分隔线上方的行的索引。
